author: Netflix Anime
description:
That moment when yoTogashi almost forgot how much he loved running — but it only takes 100 meters for him to rediscover his passion.

100 METERS is now playing on Netflix!
https://www.netflix.com/title/81785821 u remember why you love what you do #100METERS
